example.eg: Geology class today was about the cycle that water makes in the atmosphere: evaporation, condensation, precipitation.
example.egtrans: 今天地理课上讲的是大气中的水循环：蒸发、凝结和降水。

example.eg: Is there room in the basement to store a cycle?
example.egtrans: 地下室里能放下自行车吗？

example.eg: Put the clothes in the washer, pick a cycle and press the button - it's not difficult.
example.egtrans: 把衣服放到洗衣机里，选择一个清洗程序，按下开始键——一点也不难。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 整套运转过程，清洗程序

example.eg: The boiler cycles on and off throughout the day to maintain a constant temperature inside the house.
example.egtrans: 锅炉全天不断循环，保持屋子里温度恒定。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 循环, 进行循环运动

example.eg: The friends cycled into town to see a movie.
example.egtrans: 几个朋友骑自行车进城看电影。

example.eg: Let's go for a cycle ride.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 自行车的, 与自行车有关的

example.eg: The air conditioner cycle is about 20 minutes long.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 循环时间, 循环周期

example.eg: Wagner's "Ring Cycle" consists of 4 very long operas.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 一组故事, 一系列故事

example.eg: The exhibit includes a short explanatory film that cycles throughout the day.
Mona continues to cycle through the stages of grief; she cannot forget her loss.

dsense.name: bike race, bicycle race, cycle race

example.eg: The two boys decided to have a bike race around the edge of the park.
example.egtrans: 两个男孩决定环绕公园外围进行一场自行车比赛。

dsense.name: bike rack, bicycle rack, cycle rack
bike rack, bicycle rack, cycle rack
dsense.guideword: (device for carrying cycles on car) (汽车)

example.eg: Arnold's life had followed a boom-and-bust cycle, rich one moment, broke the next.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 经济繁荣与萧条的周期

example.eg: The national economy is currently in the growth phase of the business cycle.
The cycle lane ends here so you have to join the rest of the traffic.
Governments have not been able to overcome the economic cycle of boom and bust.

dsense.name: four-stroke engine, also US: four-cycle engine

trans_examp.trans_cn: 将...免费提供给别人以循环再利用

example.eg: Intensive deforestation can cause problems with the hydrologic cycle.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 水文循环, 生命周期

dsense.name: lunar cycle
dsense.guideword: (period from one full moon to another)

example.eg: Many ancient calendars were based on the lunar cycle, with all the months having 28 days.

dsense.name: two-cycle (US), two-stroke (UK)
dsense.guideword: (relating to certain engine type) (发动机类型)

dsense.name: two-stroke engine, also US: two-cycle engine
